column2: Select a Patron Deity

Patron of Xucau
Patron of Wasilla

Patron of Barastyr

Patron of Alardy
Search for an Enarei

Among the various Ossetian diviners, shamans and priests a special hereditary caste of gifted diviners granted powers by the deity Argimpasa are said to be the highest class of diviners.  Also of note this male hereditary class of diviners dressed in the opposite genders clothing and possibly represented some form of alternate gender idenity.
Seek Diviniation From Court Enarei
We are blessed to employ a court Enarei, we should seek guidance from them on the future of the realm
While taking a stroll outside, you are suddenly hit by lightening but miraculiusly survive, surely I have been blessed by Wasilla
Praise Wasilla
Chosen by Wasilla
This character has been chosen by the great deity Wasilla, this has been demonstrated by the character managing to survive a lightening strike
Enarei
The Enarei are a special hereditary caste of diviners in the Ossetian religion whose powers are said to have originated with Argimpasa
You have sent out word far and wide that you are in search of a Guru. With luck a suitable candidate will present themselves soon.
I hope I do not have to wait too long.
A strange man has come forward in the hopes of becoming your Guru, he has a mystical air about him and seems to eminate wisdom.
You will serve me well.
Your Guru has approached you and advised you that you should attempt to be less Hedonistic.
Anything for my faith.
He should mind his own business.
Your Guru has approached you about your... hobby... he believes you should reign yourself in somewhat.
Anything for my faith.
He should mind his own business.
You seem to have a remarkable interest in my hobby...
Your Guru has approached you about your... active lifestyle... he thinks you should try to be more chaste
Anything for my faith.
He should mind his own business.
Your Guru does not believe that your Gluttonous nature is doing you any favours, be they physical or spiritual.
He has a point.
Thanks for the advice, do you know when dinner is?
Your Guru Believes you are too Greedy, and has advised you to be more Charitable.
Well I suppose I had better try.
I could advise him on a thing or two...
Your Guru has given you a long lecture on the evil of envy, it seems he did not take well to you stealing that noblewoman's necklace.
I will try to be less Envious.
No! I never get what I want!
Your Guru thinks you are too Wroth and desires you put an effort into being more patient.
Alright, I suppose
Well I think you should put an effort into being less nosy!
HOW DARE YOU INSINUATE THAT I AM ANYTHING BUT PATIENT?!
Your Guru has advised you to show more humility, believing you to be too proud
Okay, I suppose I don't know everything
My Pride is perfectly justified!
Are you saying I am not great?!
Your Guru thinks you are too Arbitrary, he desires you seek to become more just and consistent
Alright, I will try
Hey! I'm in charge of my realm!
Your Guru believes you are too Cynical and has asked you to show more zeal
Alright, I will try
Does he not even see the irony?
Your Guru desires you to treat people more kindly.
Okay.
I treat people just fine!
Your Guru has approached you. He Believes you are too Paranoid and that it is impacting your quality of life. He says you should trust people more.
Alright....
I BET HE'S IN ON IT!
You have decided to ask your Guru for some advice, you wonder what you should ask for advice on.
Ask for military advice.
Ask for fertility advice.
Ask for economic advice.
You had no idea your Guru was so wise in this field! After many hours of good advice you finally had to stop him so you could get some sleep.
Now I know what to do!
Your Guru didn't really seem to know much about this field, he nevertheless improvised some advice.
I guess I'll try it...
You don't know what you're talking about, do you?
Your Guru was perhaps disturbingly... experienced... in this field, he gave you some great advice.
But how do you KNOW all this?
Perhaps asking a spiritual advisor about your romantic life was less than wise. He clearly has no idea what he's talking about.
Well advice is advice I suppose...
Has your voice even deepened yet?!
You had no idea your Guru was so wise in this field! After many hours of good advice you finally had to stop him so you could get some sleep.
Now I know what to do!
Your Guru didn't really seem to know much about this field, he nevertheless improvised some advice.
I guess I'll try it...
You don't know what you're talking about, do you?
Guardians of Wasilla
Warriors of Xucaua
High Ossetian Priesthood
High Enarei
